name: Escape The Lab (itch) (Insi_K)
description:
Escape The Lab - Unity Game Project

This is a prototype concept I have developed for my University project, and it is intended to test the main core mechanics and gather players' first impressions.

The game has been inspired by similar formulas around the market (superfighters, duck game, etc) in an attempt to bring new experiences to the player base.

I would like you to spend a moment to answer a questionnaire once you have tested the game (this is for research purposes and you should be at least 18 years of age).

Link: https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=sZetTDVZA0GoZletmKFRfhky8Jw-...

Any feedback regarding how to improve the game will be highly appreciated.

Thank you for having an interest in this project.

Game Controlls:

Move: and keys

Crouch: key

Jump:  key

Shoot:  key

Melee:  key

Open Doors: key

Throw Granade:  key

Pause Menu:  key
